title: Network Credentials
content: (If you were enrolled in DUO authentication... Follow instructions to complete the DUO authentication process)

title: CalState LA Elections menu
content: Click on CalState LA Elections menu item below.

title: Voting Options
content: This brings to Voting Options below.

title: Summary page
content: Click on CalStateLA Voting Summary page
For more information on the Candidates and their platforms click on the link below. This link takes you to the ASI Website.

title: Office Vote
content: Once ready to Vote, Click on the office you would like to Vote. If would like to vote for President office, Click on the hyperlink President. This will takeyou to the screen below which brings the candidates competing for the office of President.

title: Elect Candidate
content: Once you click on the Elect button next to the candidate that you would like to vote

title: Voting Status
content: Then click on the Vote button. Voting status will change from Not Voted to Voted

title: Choosing Representative
content: Repeat the process for all the offices that have candidates for election. Once voted you will not be able to change the selection. So Click on the vote button only after finalizing your choice.

You should be able to choose representative for your college.Example: If you are student of College of Natural and Social Sciences then you will be able to vote for the representative from your college.

title: Eight Votes
content: BOD Elections:There are eight open positions for this office. You can elect and vote up to 8 Candidates.

title: Too Many Votes Error
content: BOD Elections: There are eight open positions for this office. You can elect and vote up to 8 Candidates.

title: No Votes Error
content: If you elect no candidates and try to submit your voteâ€¦ you will get the following message.
